about_the_game:
Steve is a busy alien and they must sort out human fruits, animals, storage or even planets. To do so, Steve will combine the same objects to create better objects, make more points, and make more money!

Steve's Warehouse is inspired by the Watermelon game (Suika game) and rogue-like deckbuilding games (such as great games like Peglin, Luck be a Landlord or Balatro).

Steve's warehouse is a melting pot of physics, rogue-like and deckbuiling. Purchase objects and play them all with their weird and unexpected physics behaviours! Score as many points as possible to achieve your objectives! Don't make any object fall from your board maybe you will reach the final BOSS!

How do we play?

  • Purchase New Objects

  • Play the Entirety Of Your Deck

  • Combine objects to get better objects with crazier and better effects

  • Survive malus when you fail to reach the points requirement

  • Purchase strong passive effects every 4 rounds

What to expect?

  • 8 objects families, including Fruits, Animals, Celestials, Transportations, Storages or even Sports balls.

  • 50+ objects each with a dedicated physic, effect, and score

  • 30+ passive objects that will let you create unexcepted combos

  • 7 different arenas

  • 8 bosses

  • 6 challenges
